BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Shield
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Resist incoming damage up to the current value. Can stack up to Max. HP.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Mental Barrier
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Resist incoming Stagger damage up to the current value. Can stack up to Max. Stagger Resist.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Damage Down
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: All Offensive dice the character plays deal -{0} damage for the Scene.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Damage Down X
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: All Offensive dice the character plays deal -X damage for the Scene.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Bleed Fragile
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Take {0} additional damage from Bleed this Scene.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Bleed Fragile X
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Take X additional damage from Bleed for the Scene.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Bleed Protection
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Take {0} less damage from Bleed this Scene.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Bleed Protection X
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Take X less damage from Bleed for the Scene.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Burn Fragile
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Take {0} additional damage from Burn this Scene.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Burn Fragile X
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Take X additional damage from Burn for the Scene.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Burn Protection
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Take {0} less damage from Burn this Scene.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Burn Protection X
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Take X less damage from Burn for the Scene.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Rupture Fragile
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Take {0} additional damage from Rupture this Scene.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Rupture Fragile X
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Take X additional damage from Rupture for the Scene.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Rupture Protection
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Take {0} less damage from Rupture this Scene.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Rupture Protection X
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Take X less damage from Rupture for the Scene.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Sinking Fragile
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Take {0} additional Stagger damage from Sinking this Scene.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Sinking Fragile X
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Take X additional Stagger damage from Sinking for the Scene.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Sinking Protection
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Take {0} less Stagger damage from Sinking this Scene.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Sinking Protection X
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Take X less Stagger damage from Sinking for the Scene.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Increased Light Restoration
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: For the Scene, when restoring Light, restore {0} additional Light.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Increased Light Restoration X
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: For the Scene, when restoring Light, restore X additional Light.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Increased Max Light Capacity
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Increase Max Light Capacity by {0} until the status is removed.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Increased Max Light Capacity X
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Increase Max Light Capacity by X until the status is removed.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Decreased Max Light Capacity
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Decrease Max Light Capacity by {0} until the status is removed.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Decreased Max Light Capacity X
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Decrease Max Light Capacity by X until the status is removed.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Increased Max Hand Size
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Increase Max Hand Size by {0} until the status is removed.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Increased Max Hand Size X
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Increase Max Hand Size by X until the status is removed.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Decreased Max Hand Size
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Decrease Max Hand Size by {0} until the status is removed.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Decreased Max Hand Size X
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Decrease Max Hand Size by X until the status is removed.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Slash Power-down
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Slash dice lose {0} Power for this Scene.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Slash Power-down X
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Slash dice lose X Power for this Scene.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Pierce Power-down
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Pierce dice lose {0} Power for this Scene.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Pierce Power-down X
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Pierce dice lose X Power for this Scene.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Blunt Power-down
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Blunt dice lose {0} Power for this Scene.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Blunt Power-down X
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Blunt dice lose X Power for this Scene.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Temporary Speed Dice
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Gain {0} additional Speed dice for the Scene.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Rupture
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: When hit, take {0} damage and halve the stack. (Rounds down)

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Rupture X
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: When hit, take X damage and halve the stack. (Rounds down)

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Dimensional Rift
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: At the end of each Scene, inflict {0} Rupture to this character and lose 1 stack.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Dimensional Rift X
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: At the end of each Scene, inflict X Rupture to this character and lose 1 stack.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Sinking
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: When hit, take {0} Stagger damage and halve the stack. (Rounds down)

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Sinking X
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: When hit, take X Stagger damage and halve the stack. (Rounds down)

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Sinking Deluge
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Activate all target's Sinking instantly, but use current target's [Sinking] as base damage value. If target's Stagger Resist drops to 0, convert overflowing Stagger damage to physical damage.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Tremor
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: If Stagger Resist drops to {0}, become Staggered. At the end of the Scene, if Staggered, purge this status.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Tremor X
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: If Stagger Resist drops to X, become Staggered. At the end of the Scene, if Staggered, purge this status.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Tremor Burst
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Deal damage and Stagger damage equal to target's Tremor.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Innate
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: This page will be drawn at the start of the Act.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Poise
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: When rolling an Offensive die, boost the maximum roll value of it by half of its original value (Rounded down), and increase damage by <color=#88ABAB><u>{X}%</u></color>. On a successful hit, lose the amount stack equal to the amount by which the maximum roll value was boosted.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: Poise X
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: When rolling an Offensive die, boost the maximum roll value of it by half of its original value (Rounded down), and increase damage by <color=#88ABAB><u>(X x 5)%</u></color>. On a successful hit, lose the amount stack equal to the amount by which the maximum roll value was boosted.

BattleEffectTextExtra.Name: On Crit
BattleEffectTextExtra.Desc: Activates when dealing damage if the natural roll is higher than the original maximum roll value.
